name: Demon Bubblegum (Prototype)
description:
Demon Bubblegum is a game about a human with a hole in her stomach. Inside the hole floats a "bubblegum" - a portal to the demon world and the source of her powers.

This is a prototype we made when we had a month to work together full-time and that we've tweaked a bit since then. Our goal was to make one level from start to finish, with a boss fight.

Controls:

Mouse + Keyboard

or

This game supports an XBOX controller. Sorry, but we don't have time right now to add support for other gamepads : /
